foreignData.name: Advokat der Abwehr
foreignData.text: {T}: Bringe zwei Karten deiner Wahl aus dem Friedhof eines Gegners auf seine Hand zurück. Zerstöre eine angreifende Kreatur deiner Wahl.

foreignData.flavorText: "Nuestra unidad les da una lección de humildad a nuestros enemigos".
foreignData.name: Defensor magodesdén
foreignData.text: {T}: Regresa dos cartas objetivo del cementerio de un oponente a su mano. Destruye la criatura atacante objetivo.

foreignData.name: Partisan des repoussmages
foreignData.text: {T}: Renvoyez dans sa main deux cartes ciblées du cimetière d'un adversaire. Détruisez la créature attaquante ciblée.

foreignData.flavorText: "La nostra unione umilia i nostri nemici".
foreignData.name: Difensore di Magisdegno
foreignData.text: {T}: Il proprietario riprende in mano due carte bersaglio presenti nel suo cimitero. Distruggi una creatura attaccante bersaglio.

foreignData.name: Advogado dos Magi-Repelidores
foreignData.text: {T}: Devolve dois cards alvo do cemitério de um oponente para a mão dele. Destrói a criatura alvo atacante.

name: Spurnmage Advocate
originalText:
oc
T: Return two target cards in an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Destroy target attacking creature.

rulings.text: The ability is not countered if both cards are missing from the graveyard on resolution and the creature target is there. This makes it possible to have two Spurnmage Advocates both target the same two cards and end up destroying two creatures.
You can’t activate this ability unless a single opponent has at least two cards in their graveyard to target.

text: {T}: Return two target cards from an opponent's graveyard to their hand. Destroy target attacking creature.
